description: Travel through the beautiful Ebbw Valley on this walk from Festival Park in Ebbw Vale to the Sirhowy Valley Country Park , near Risca. On the way you will pass Crumlin, Newbridge , Abercarn, Crosskeys and Risca where you can enjoy riverside trails along the Sirhowy River.
